Hi everyone after being in an out of the series 6 set for a while I am getting out and moving my last card of Fred Toney.  

I am asking 150.00  Payment by paypal only.  I will cover the shipping cost.

Message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url] if interested.  Scans are below.  Thanks

William

Card has been moved to ebay this morning on a 24hr auction that ends tomorrow at 11:20am.  

William
